CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(RFM__pc,"Occasionnel"),IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_100.gif", "1 Star"), IF(ISPICKVAL(RFM__pc,"Moyen"),IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_200.gif", "2 Star"), IF(ISPICKVAL(RFM__pc,"Bon"),IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_300.gif", "3 Star"), IF(ISPICKVAL(RFM__pc,"Assidu"),IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "4 Stars"), IF(ISPICKVAL(RFM__pc,"Fid√®le"),IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "5 Stars"), IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_000.gif", "0 Star"))))))
CustomField.label: Evaluation
